sen.j: 均子内親王（きんしないしんのう、寛平2年（890年） - 延喜10年2月25日 (旧暦)（910年4月7日））は、平安時代の皇族・皇女。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Kinshi (890-April 7, 910) was a member of the imperial family and a princess in the Heian period.
Imperial Princess Kinshi (890-April 7, 910) was a member of the imperial family and a princess during the Heian period.
Imperial Princess Kinshi (890 - April 12, 910) was a member of the Imperial Family and a princess during the Heian period.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に修正しました。

sen.j: 父親は宇多天皇（源定省）、母親は藤原温子。
sen.e: Her father was Emperor Uda (MINAMOTO no Sadami), and her mother was FUJIWARA no Onshi.
Her father was Emperor Uda (MINAMOTO no Sadami), and her mother was FUJIWARA no Onshi.
Her father was Emperor Uda (MINAMOTO no Sadami), and her mother was FUJIWARA no Onshi.

sen.j: 藤原温子の一人娘である。
sen.e: She was the only daughter of FUJIWARA no Onshi.
She was the only daughter of FUJIWARA no Onshi.
She was the only daughter of FUJIWARA no Onshi.

sen.j: 後に異母兄である敦慶親王の妃となる。
sen.e: Later, she became a wife of Imperial Prince Atsuyoshi who was a half elder brother to her with a different mother.
Later, she became the wife of Imperial Prince Atsuyoshi who was a half elder brother to her by a different mother.
Later, she became the wife of Imperial Prince Atsuyoshi who was her older paternal half-brother.
sen.cmt: 異母兄 の表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 日本の歌物語『伊勢物語』には、藤原温子・春澄洽子・伊勢 (歌人)・藤原高経女と共に和歌の集まりに参加する姿が描かれており、歌人としても名を残している。
sen.e: In "Ise Monogatari" (The tales of Ise), a tale of poems of Japan, she appeared as a poet who participated the waka gathering with FUJIWARA no Onshi, HARUSUMI, Amaneiko, Ise (waka poet), a daughter of FUJIWARA no Takatsune; she left her name as a poet.

In "Ise Monogatari" (The tales of Ise), a tale of poems of Japan, she appeared as a poet who participated in waka gathering with FUJIWARA no Onshi, HARUSUMI, Amaneiko, Ise (waka poet), the daughter of FUJIWARA no Takatsune; she left her name as a poet.

In "Ise Monogatari" (The tales of Ise), a tale of poems of Japan, she appeared as a poet who participated in waka gathering with FUJIWARA no Onshi, HARUSUMI no Amaneiko, Ise (waka poet), the daughter of FUJIWARA no Takatsune; she left her name as a poet.
sen.cmt: 人名を一部修正しました。
